info.brief_description: to embody a boyofenigma character or to embody a character who meets boyofenigma character
info.description:
this story and based on the characters of https://www.furaffinity.net/user/boyofenigma/
I had his agreement and the owner will follow the story

you will have the choice to embody a boyofenigma character
or you could embody a simple human who will meet one of these characters


The rules will be from what boyofenigma refuses, but I will just love no death, no end of history and no women.
